title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2013 - Łódź, Poland
description:
Global Day of Code Retreat is organized in Łódź as usual, by Łódź Java Users Group (http://info.lodz.jug.pl/). This year, it's hosted by Cybercom Poland (http://www.cybercom.pl/). 
For more information and registration, please visit: http://www.meetup.com/Java-User-Group-Lodz/events/151044742/
